name: Wrike
description: Integrate with Wrike to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Tasks
tools.description: List tasks in Wrike. Optionally filter by folder, status, or custom fields.

tools.name: Create Task
tools.description: Create a new task in a Wrike folder or project. Specify title, description, assignees, and dates.

tools.name: List Folders
tools.description: List folders and projects in Wrike. Optionally filter within a specific parent folder.

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all projects in Wrike. Returns project names, statuses, and owner info.

tools.name: Update Task
tools.description: Update an existing Wrike task. Change title, description, status, assignees, or dates.
